title: Bitcoin comes to UK PayPal - but not for payments
description: PayPal will allow cryptocurrency investment - but the assets cannot be used to make payments.
content:

title: Bitcoin back above $50,000 as recovery continues
description: The digital currency is rebounding from a deep slump as more mainstream financial firms recognise it.
content:
The price of Bitcoin has risen above $50,000 (£36,480) for the first time in three months as the cryptocurrency continues to recover from a deep slump.
